task.title: How to change the text color in a Microsoft Word document.
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to change text color in Microsoft Word document.

prereq.p: Your Word Application have to be installed on your device and you have to have a Microsoft Word document on which you can work on.

context.p: This task can change the color of your text when you need to mark an important part of your text.

step.cmd: Select the text for which you want the color to be changed.
Right click on the text and press the color button.

result.p: The selected color of the text appears successfully in the color that you have chosen!

example.p: You can change the color of the text when you want the attention of the reader to be captured!
